metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26408 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A limited information disclosure vulnerability exists in Gitlab CE/EE from>= 12.2 to <13.4.7, >=13.5 to <13.5.5, and >=13.6 to <13.6.2 that allows anattacker to view limited information in user's private profile

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
